1.0.name: wordpress/redesign
1.0.description: Redesign is a simple, clean and highly visible theme with transparent graphics. It's suitable for blogging or businesses. The Redesign theme is responsive, and easy to read in handheld units. The range is from desktop size to flipped iPhone. There are two navigation menus, one header widget, two sidebar widgets and a footer widget. Custom header, background image and colors. The theme is not based on any other WP theme. It's made from scratch.
